Description.Text: Located a block from Fifth Avenue's Museum Mile, which marks Central Park's eastern boundary, the hotel attracts an international clientele wishing to enjoy a village-like, pedestrian-friendly, upper-crust neighborhood while visiting attractions such as the Jewish Museum (one block), the Cooper-Hewitt Design Museum (three blocks), and the Guggenheim Museum (five blocks).

• Central Park - 1 block • Jewish Museum - 1 block • International Center of Photography - 2 blocks • Cooper-Hewitt Design Museum - 3 blocks • Guggenheim Museum - 5 blocks • Museum of the City of New York - 10 blocks • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 12 blocks • Rockefeller Center - 1.25 miles • Times Square - 1.5 miles

Hotel Wales offers 87 guestrooms and suites in a 10-story Victorian building with elaborate trim. Accommodations have high ceilings with crown molding, brass lamps and chandeliers, antique-style furniture, and wooden-slat blinds. Bedding consists of Belgian linens, down comforters with white cotton covers, and down pillows. CD player/radios and televisions with VCRs provide entertainment. Frette Italian terry-cloth bathrobes furnish lounging comfort.

A rooftop-garden terrace provides views of the Upper East Side and a glimpse of the East River. Complimentary Continental breakfast and a 24-hour complimentary espresso machine are available in a spacious room featuring Victorian-childhood art, upholstered seating, plants and flowers, and tall windows overlooking lively neighborhood streets. The hotel's casual restaurant/café draws lively crowds of locals.

• Golfing • Ice skating • Swimming • Rowing or canoeing • Tennis • Running track/path • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction on site • Aerobics • Bicycle rentals • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental • Playground
• Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

• From JFK International Airport: Follow the signs to New York City (Midtown Manhattan). Take I-678 North to Queens Midtown Tunnel (pay toll). Upon exiting tunnel, bear right to 37th Street. Follow 37th Street to Madison Avenue and turn left. Hotel Wales is located at 92nd Street.

• Sarabeth's Restaurant: Located in the lobby, this restaurant serves upscale American home cooking with fresh baked goods and a well-known weekend brunch. • Cafe' 92: Cafe' 92 is a neighborhood lunch and dinner restaurant with full bar service.
